original: 諸葛亮出兵祁山，姜維投降，考察其為涼州上士。敏於軍事，既有膽義，深解兵意。所學盡授之。
text: Zhuge Liang sent troops to Qishan, Jiang Wei surrendered and inspected him as a sergeant in Liangzhou. Being agile in the military has the courage and righteousness and a deep understanding of the military will. What you have learned is taught.
